notes:
**Note 1:**   Linitis plastica is defined as diffuse involvement of the entire thickness of the stomach wall and coded as localized in Summary Stage.

**Note 2:**   Discontinuous involvement is considered metastatic with the exception of implants within the stomach which are considered localized in Summary Stage. Malignant (positive) peritoneal cytology is coded in SEER Mets.
